p: By January 20th, many countries, including Japan, South Korea and Thailand had reported their first cases. The next day the first case was confirmed in the USA. The virus continued to spread until its first case was recorded in the Philippines (February 2nd), France (February 14th), Iran (February 21â€‰st). By February 23th, the first case appeared in Italy, then many countries through Europe reported their first cases [ 5].
